original_title: The Psychology of Bilingualism: A Conversation with Ellen Bialystok
overview: An in-depth conversation with Ellen Bialystok, Professor of Psychology at York University, who is a world-leading expert on the effects of bilingualism on cognitive processes across our lifespan.
tagline: Bilingualism and its profound effect on our lives
title: The Psychology of Bilingualism: A Conversation with Ellen Bialystok
